heading: Today
text: Clouds giving way to sunshine, this morning in the valleys, in the mountains this afternoon.  Brisk and cold.  Highs only in the teens to near 20 north, in the 20s south.  Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph through NH, decreasing in the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear this evening.  Clouds increasing from the west after midnight, with snow developing in NY, reaching the Green Mountains by morning.  Lows 0 to 10 above south, and 10 below to 5 above north.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning light snow, a dusting to 2 inches, tapering off.  Then mostly cloudy, some sunny breaks, with localized afternoon snow showers spreading east.  Highs in the upper 20s to mid 30s.  Winds becoming south to southeast 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph through the Champlain Valley, and over the higher terrain.
